-1.title: Wahoo in Bermuda

imdb.plot outline: Traveling from the Florida Keys to Belize to Panama, SFTV presents cinematic portraits of the world's top fisheries, and profiles the captains, locals and families whose lives connect to them. Mixing top-notch cinematography and in-depth storytelling, SFTV captures the action and drama of saltwater fishing like you've never seen before.
imdb.title: Sport Fishing Television
plot: Traveling from the Florida Keys to Belize to Panama, SFTV presents cinematic portraits of the world's top fisheries, and profiles the captains, locals and families whose lives connect to them. Mixing top-notch cinematography and in-depth storytelling, SFTV captures the action and drama of saltwater fishing like you've never seen before.
